title: App Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Reflective Critical Practice for Higher Education Learning System Transformation

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental understanding of educational system changes and intermediate-level social science expertise
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can analyze cases of higher education system change using a reflective-critical practice framework.
Learners can develop strategies to resolve stakeholder conflicts arising during educational system change through VR simulations.
Learners can propose ethical and social responsibility measures necessary for facilitating educational system change.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
